Published and Promoted by Sarah Hill of 13 Smyth Close, Market Harborough LE16 7NS on behalf of Phil Knowles of Bream Cottage, East Langton, Market Harborough LE16 7TB. Phil@philknowles.eu
“Phil has the ability to take a policy and to make its implications relevant.”
Phil is an advocate of Community Politics he believes that politicians should have one goal - to connect with the community they represent and to work hard for them.
He is married with one grown-up son and a recently added daughter-in-law. Phil is respected by people across the political spectrum and by many senior business executives in the UK, across Europe and the wider world.
Phil understands the need for co-operation between people of varied backgrounds. He has the ability to resolve problems, lead debates/discussions and to make a real and positive difference to the lives of many people.
